overview:
Matthew Berardo is Vice President and General Manager of LiveJournal. In his position, he reports to Andrew Paulson, CEO of SUP, the owners of LiveJournal.

Berardo joined LiveJournal from Yahoo, where he was most recently Sr. Director of International Business and Product Management. In that role, Berardo was responsible for managing the executive international agenda from Yahoo corporate headquarters in Sunnyvale, CA.

Prior to that, Berardo was the Sr. Director, Global Platforms in the Technology Division. Berardo spent 7 years in London in various positions at Yahoo Europe, most recently as Sr. Director of Broadband and Network Services where he was responsible for the Yahoo Frontpage, My Yahoo and BT Yahoo, a strategic partnership with British Telecom. Berardo was also responsible for other network-wide services such as billing and registration across the Yahoo European network.
